Nighlithg:

Nightlight Nodded, she stood up with fear in her face. she was =
ready to follow Rodimus.


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Monday, April 12, 2=
010 11:14 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Wh=
o: DARK RODIMUS, Nightlight
Location: Black Fortress - Research/Panic Room
=

> "Rodi.. mus... what... what is goin on?"said a weak Nightlight  in the p=
anic room

Rodimus grunted as he doubled over, falling to his knees. For a =
moment
there was a flux of power all around him, sparks of energy reaching
=
out like lightning. His black metal frame flashed as a crimson then
red hue=
 moved along it like water, yellow optics looked up at the
female who used =
to to be Nightlight, and just for a moment there was
stark recognition in t=
hem, as if the world opened up to him. However
this followed quickly by a p=
rofound look of sadness, guilt and pain
that washed across his face. His op=
tics once again became red and the
familliar black hue of his armor returne=
d.

"I don't know!" he said as he seemed to gasp for breath and climbed to
=
his feet. "I bet it was that idiot Tuscon!" Rodimus checked his
weapon, sli=
ding it open, and then closed again, assuring himself that
it was at full c=
harge. "I think it is time for me to take care of him
once and for all!"

H=
e looked at the female, his look again a mixture of sorrow and guilt
and fe=
ar, "But you need to be protected." Rodimus' placed the device
that hid the=
 spark signature on the female who used to be Nightlight,
"I have mine alre=
ady." he said, displaying it for her to see.

"Come with me. We need to get=
 you out of here, then I have a Tuscon to
melt into slag!!"

(TAG)

Preston=
